title: Team is LF Support!
body:
We are looking for a support for our Team Genesis Green.

We are a young team with people who can play their roles very well and now we want to win an active supporter. 

We are currently pracitising on tuesday, wednesday, fridays, Saturday and sunday's are the League Games. 
Usually we play from CET 8-9pm - to somewhere around 11pm or 12 (with some nice breaks etc). 

What we require of you :
- proficient English
- willingness to learn and study different ways of playing heroes
- Ability to take criticism
- Discord
- Mic
- ability to stand losing 
- experience in your role
- Have a wide Champion Pool 3+ is for the start enough.


What we offer to you :
- we speak english
- we play on euwest 
- our team consists of 1 British 1 Netherlands 1 French and 3 German guys.
- A strong will to win and improve
- we also take part in a Tournament Equinox League. Of course, we play solo/duo and Flex Queue.

for more info Add us in League:  GEN Lyro or Nirolex

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
